Don't Let This Chair Sale Roll Away There's still time to buy a chair from our selected list and get a FREE chair mat. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/143002-1_ES_ROBBINS_Natural_Origins_36_x_48_Hard_Floor_Straight_Edge_Chairmat_With_Lip.aspx?cmp=EBAPRILFURNBLITZ19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Hard Floor Mat Use code 1904CCM at checkout (Valued at $53.21) <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/120023-1_ES_ROBBINS_EverLife_36_x_48_Flat_To_Low_Pile_Straight_Edge_Chairmat_With_Lip.aspx?cmp=EBAPRILFURNBLITZ19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Carpet Mat Use code 1904FCM at checkout (Valued at $49.88) Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-BV7?cmp=EBAPRILFURNBLITZ19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Offer valid until April 30th, 2019 Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only from April 15, 2019 – April 30, 2019 or while supplies last, whichever occurs first. Enter promo code 1904FCM (Hard Floor Mat Sku 143002-1 Valued at $53.21) when you purchase one of these selected chairs MVL2803-1, 7482-3-1, 7491-3-1, MVL11870-1, 7473-3-1, 31173N-1, MVL3191F-1, MVL2806-1, MVL2823-1, OTG11686-1, MVL2789F-1 at checkout or Enter promo code 1904CCM (Flat to Low Pile Floor Mat Sku 120023-1 Valued at $49.88) when you purchase one of these selected chairs MVL2803-1, 7482-3-1, 7491-3-1, MVL11870-1, 7473-3-1, 31173N-1, MVL3191F-1, MVL2806-1, MVL2823-1, OTG11686-1, MVL2789F-1 at checkout . One time use only. Excludes tax. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer is not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only with Ship To Locations in Calgary or Ontario. Cash value .001¢.
